attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. Isuzu D-Max 1.9HR S/C Range

RUGGED, RELIABLE AND ALWAYS READY TO GET THE JOB DONE. ISUZU'S New D-Max Single Cab bakkies are the ultimate workhorses. The perfect Partners for your Business

MAXIMUM PERFORMANCE - UNRIVALLED RELIABILITY - MUSCULAR STYLING			SURPRISING COMFORT - ADVANCED AUTOMOTIVE TECH

Our Boldest Bakkie

The all-new ISUZU D-MAX Single Cab range offers four new models built to drive South African businesses. Each ISUZU D-MAX Single Cab bakkie is forged from decades’ experience manufacturing locally-engineered bakkies that deliver durability, reliability, and capability. Now with a BOLD new approach, ISUZU D-MAX Single Cab bakkies feature the latest in automotive design, technology, comfort, and safety. You’ll travel a long way to find a more reliable, more durable bakkie.
With a 1.9-litre turbo-charged diesel engine under the hood, ISUZU D-MAX Single Cab bakkies boast more than enough power to conquer construction sites and urban jungles. Whatever the distance or the load, get the job done with a capable ISUZU D-MAX Single Cab.
Fuel Efficiency
Smart, ‘gradelogic’ transmission prevents over-revving and unnecessary fuel burn by ensuring that the new ISUZU D-MAX Single Cab bakkies stay in the best gear for the workplace. Overall weight reduction also contributes to excellent fuel consumption at just 7.4 litres per 100km depending on prevailing conditions and driving habits(please see range brochure f
